name: Acolyte
description: You served in a temple, monastery, or religious order, tending to the faithful and studying sacred texts.

name: Artisan
description: You practiced a craft or trade, creating goods with your hands and selling them in markets and shops.

name: Criminal
description: You lived on the wrong side of the law, whether as a thief, smuggler, fence, or member of a criminal organization.

name: Entertainer
description: You made your living performing for crowds - as a bard, actor, acrobat, or storyteller.

name: Folk Hero
description: You're a champion of the common folk, known for standing up to tyranny or monsters that threatened your community.

name: Guard
description: You served as a city watch member, castle guard, or caravan escort, keeping the peace and protecting others.

name: Merchant
description: You traveled trade routes, buying and selling goods, learning the value of everything and the cost of trust.

name: Noble
description: Born to privilege, you grew up in luxury with education, etiquette, and expectations of leadership.

name: Outlander
description: You lived far from civilization - as a hermit, wilderness guide, or tribal member - surviving by your connection to the natural world.

name: Sailor
description: You worked aboard ships, whether as crew, officer, or perhaps even a pirate, learning the ways of wind and wave.

name: Scholar
description: You devoted yourself to learning, spending years in libraries, universities, or under the tutelage of wise masters.

name: Urchin
description: You grew up on the streets with no family to speak of, surviving through wit, speed, and knowing every back alley.
